answers.answer: Please post your thyroid test results and reference ranges shown on the lab report.
When they did your labs, did they test for diabetes? Waking up several times to urinate may indicate something else.
Hi, thats the results . Thank you.tsh.03/normal range is .35-5.50ft4 1.3thyroid stimulating immunoglob is 6.0 tsi index /normal range is less than or equal to 1.3
They check for diabetes and was negative . I love cake and sweets and i am avoiding because i agree with you is a symptom and everyone in my parents have :(Thank u

question: when I am going to sleep all night long ? I just found out i have thyroid and i cant sleep with diferent symptoms every night. abdominal pain or urgency to urinate is what happens to me. I am so tired i dont know what to do with myself. I work 4 days a week because i cant give up. Hope someone can talk to me :)
title: sleep with hyperthyroid
